You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Pass More Data to API Method Input Keys

Several methods in the B2B Commerce for Visualforce API accept new input keys or accept new data types for input keys.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: If you've created subscriber code that extends or overrides any affected methods, update your extensions to account for these changes.

CHANGE	UPGRADE IMPACT
The ccrz.ccApiPriceList.fetchPriceListItems() method now accepts the ccrz.ccApiPriceList.PLI_IDS input key for filtering a request by CC Price List Items Lightning Platform IDs.	None
The ccrz.ccApiTestData class now includes methods for creating account groups, price lists, account group price lists, categories, accounts, contacts, and users.	None


Entity sizing for method calls can now declare a new SZ_XS value, which returns only the record name and Lightning Platform ID:

ccrz.ccApi.SZ_DATA => ccrz.ccApi.SZ_XS
	None
The ccrz.ccApiProduct.search() method now searches ccrz__E_ProductItemI18N__c data from fallback locales.	None
The ccrz.ccApiTransactionPayment class now supports date, datetime, or string formats for the ccrz.ccApiTransactionPayment.FROMDATE and ccrz.ccApiTransactionPayment.TODATE input keys. Previously, these input keys accepted only strings.	

Any existing ccrz.ccApiTransactionPayment.FROMDATE or ccrz.ccApiTransactionPayment.TODATE input keys are transformed on the input map to be datetime values.

For example, the string 1/1/2000 is transformed to a datetime value.




The following methods now respect the returned Map<String, Object> convention between template methods:

ccrz.ccApiCart.getActive()
ccrz.ccApiWishList.addTo()
ccrz.ccApiWishList.getActive()
	None
